meanings.definition: Feeling or displaying the need for food
meanings.sent1: The little boy was the hungriest in the class during snack time.
meanings.sent2: After playing outside all day, I felt the hungriest I had ever been.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called herself the hungriest monster in the house when dinner was late.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were the hungriest I had ever seen, eagerly scanning the menu for his favorite dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies made me feel like the hungriest person on earth.

meanings.definition: Having a strong desire or craving for something
meanings.sent1: Sarah was the hungriest for adventure among all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The artist was the hungriest for inspiration after a long creative block.
meanings.sent3: The detective's hungriest desire was to solve the mysterious case that had baffled everyone.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was the hungriest, driving him to work tirelessly towards his goals.
meanings.sent5: The crowd's applause was the hungriest for an encore, showing their appreciation for the performance.
